p: For the microbiological studies the bacteria strains used were: 16 S. aureus (15 clinical isolates and the reference strain ATCC 25923), 16 E. coli (15 clinical isolates and the reference strain ATCC 25922) were obtained from the collection of Laboratorio de Microbiología, Departamento de Tecnología Médica, Universidad Diego Portales kindly provided by Pedro Cortés and 15 C. albicans and C. parapsilosis (ATCC 22019) (a reference strain used in genus Candida assays, kindly provided by Dr. Alvarez, Instituto de Ciencias Biomédicas, Facultad de Medicina, Universidad de Chile. The strains were grown in Mueller Hinton Agar and incubated at 37 °C.
